column1: ==Etymology==
Nirnaeth (or Nírnaeth) Arnoediad (or Arnediad) is Sindarin for "Tears Uncountable".
Note that the "oe" of "Arnoediad" is not the Sindarin diphthong "oe"
column2: but rather the single i-affection vowel "œ"
